expo.name: skateTBA_expo
expo.description: Provides easy access to numerous local skate spots, and allows users to add their own!

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Needed to track user location in order to show their position on the map, and properly display user skateboard icon/location.
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Used to display user location to show position relative to points of interest on the main map.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Used to allow users to upload images and videos of good skating locations near them.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Used to allow sound when a user uploads a video for a point of interest.
